titleStmt.title: Truth defended, and the friends thereof cleared from the false charges, foul reproaches, and envious cavils, cast upon it and them, by George Keith (an apostate from them) in two books by him lately published, the one being called A true copy of a paper given into yearly meeting of the people called Quakers, &c. the other, The pretended yearly meeting of by Thomas Ellwood.
titleStmt.author: Ellwood, Thomas, 1639-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
